name: pause-urbaine
description: Pause Urbaine website and WordPress theme

scripts.wp: pnpm wp:build-css && bash -c 'SHORT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && sed -i.bak "s/Version: .*/Version: 1.0.0-${SHORT_SHA}/" pause-urbaine-wp-theme/style.css && zip -r pause-urbaine-theme.zip pause-urbaine-wp-theme -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store" -x "pause-urbaine-wp-theme/assets/*.scss" -x "pause-urbaine-wp-theme/assets/_*.scss" && mv pause-urbaine-wp-theme/style.css.bak pause-urbaine-wp-theme/style.css && echo "WordPress theme archive created: pause-urbaine-theme.zip (version: 1.0.0-${SHORT_SHA})"'

author: Pause Urbaine
